page.description: Alpha Anywhere provides the following and methods for manipulating form controls. Prefix the following methods with the pointer to the control.

case.title: .SET_PASSWORD()
case.description: Sets or changes the button's password.

case.title: .FIELD_GET()
case.description: Returns a pointer to the table field that is bound to the control.

case.title: .CONTAINER_GET()
case.description: Returns the name of the control's container.

case.title: .TAB_GET()
case.description: Returns the Page_Number of the tab page that is visible.

case.title: .TAB_SET()
case.description: Displays the specified tab page of a tabbed control.

case.title: .CONTAINER_GET()
case.description: Returns the name of the control's container.

case.title: .FIELD_GET()
case.description: Returns a pointer to the table field that is bound to the control.

case.title: .TEXTREPLACE()
case.description: Places text into a text control.

case.title: .TEXTSELECT()
case.description: Selects text in a control starting at Start_Position and running for Length characters.
